activities: Twitch collects personal information during certain transactions and communications with its users, including when users register to use Twitch products and services; upload, purchase, view or download certain content or products from Twitch; and enter contests or sweepstakes.  Personal information may be transferred from the EU to the US (where Twitch is located) for the purposes of operating, maintaining, enhancing, and providing all of the features and services offered by Twitch; customer communications; supporting transactions; marketing; customer and technical support; data analysis; and data storage.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Online, off-line, and manually processed customer data.
recoursemech: Twitch Interactive, Inc. is member of the Better Business Bureaus (BBB) EU Safe Harbor Program.
